title: Rapha Classic Jerseys thread recycled polyester into new Performance Merino 150
content:
Rapha have taken a further step forward in their journey to reducing their reliance on raw materials, updating their Rapha Performance Merino 150 fabric with recycled polyester. That fabric is the main component of the brand’s original cycling jersey; the Rapha Classic. Here’s an update into what materials actually go into this iconic road cycling […]

author: Jessie-May Morgan
